description: Create customizable widgets to display your reviews on any website. Choose from different layouts, customize colors and styling, and embed with simple HTML code.

key_features.title: Multiple Layout Options
key_features.description: Choose from list view, card layout, compact sidebar view, or full-width testimonial style to match your website design.

key_features.title: Complete Customization
key_features.description: Customize colors, fonts, borders, shadows, and star rating colors to perfectly match your brand identity.

key_features.title: Advanced Filtering
key_features.description: Filter reviews by rating, date, or keywords. Set minimum star ratings and control review text length.

key_features.title: Real-Time Updates
key_features.description: Widgets automatically update when new reviews come in. Changes to your widget settings appear instantly.

key_features.title: Mobile Responsive
key_features.description: All widgets are fully responsive and look perfect on phones, tablets, and desktops automatically.

key_features.title: Performance Analytics
key_features.description: Track widget views, engagement, and performance metrics to optimize your social proof strategy.

how_it_works.title: Create Your Widget
how_it_works.description: Go to the Widgets section in your dashboard and click

how_it_works.title: Customize Appearance
how_it_works.description: Customize colors, fonts, layout, and display options. Filter reviews by rating or date and preview your widget in real-time.

how_it_works.title: Get Embed Code
how_it_works.description: Copy the generated embed code. It's just a simple HTML snippet that works like embedding a YouTube video.

how_it_works.title: Add to Your Website
how_it_works.description: Paste the embed code into your website's HTML. The widget will automatically load and display your reviews beautifully.

best_practices.title: Strategic Placement
best_practices.description: Place widgets where they have maximum impact - homepage testimonial sections, product pages, or checkout pages to build trust at crucial moments.

best_practices.title: Show Your Best Reviews
best_practices.description: Use filtering to showcase 4-5 star reviews. Focus on reviews that mention specific benefits or outcomes that matter to your prospects.

best_practices.title: Match Your Brand
best_practices.description: Customize colors, fonts, and styling to seamlessly integrate with your website. Widgets should feel like a natural part of your site.

best_practices.title: Keep It Fresh
best_practices.description: Regularly update which reviews you display. Fresh, recent reviews are more compelling than outdated ones, even if they're positive.
